column4: I wanted to ask you guys if some glitches with Unity have been fixed. I stopped using Unity a while ago because there were glitches like when I would close an app, the app would just disappear and not minimize correctly.
I have used LUbuntu for the past 2 distros that came out but would it be ok to switch back to Unity if I wanted to try it out?
try it and see.. ive not any issues with it.
ok I guess I'll give it a shot. :) If I have any issues I'll be back.
